original_text: Judah had sex with Er's widow, Tamar. She gave birth to two sons for Judah, Perez and Zerah. Judah was the father of five sons.
korean_text: 유다의 며느리 다말이 유다에게 베레스와 세라를 낳아 주었으니 유다의 아들이 모두 다섯이더라

sentences.original_text: Judah had sex with Er's widow, Tamar.
She gave birth to two sons for Judah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 유다를 위해 두 아들을 낳았습니다,

sentences.original_text: Judah was the father of five sons.
